name: Sub0ptimal Demo
description:
Sub0ptimal

guns, death and an A.I  (sounds like a normal Tuesday with the boys)

Sub0ptimal, is a game that makes me want to die inside, because is so average that it makes any other game look Amazing!

Hopefully everyone that plays this game has a bad time. 

(that's our guarantee)

warning this game is bad.

Download Instructions:

Step 1: download files

Step 2: unzip files (easier if you move to desktop, to see the files better)

Step 3: open files and launch the .exe (keep all files in the folder, it has to be like that to work)

Step 4: delete game because it's bad
